title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: Set in the summer of 1922, The Great Gatsby follows Nick Carraway as he moves to West Egg and becomes neighbors with the mysterious Jay Gatsby. A masterpiece of American literature exploring themes of wealth, love, and the American Dream.

reviews.comment: A timeless classic that never gets old. Fitzgerald's prose is absolutely beautiful.
Great exploration of the American Dream. Required reading for everyone.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A gripping, heart-wrenching, and wholly remarkable tale of coming-of-age in a South poisoned by virulent prejudice. Through the eyes of Scout Finch, we see the injustices of the adult world.

reviews.comment: One of the most important books ever written. Powerful and moving.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian social science fiction novel that follows Winston Smith, a member of the Outer Party who lives in Airstrip One, formerly Great Britain. A chilling prophecy about the future.

reviews.comment: Terrifyingly relevant even today. Orwell was a visionary.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: The story follows Elizabeth Bennet and her complex relationship with the proud Darcy. A witty, romantic novel that explores themes of love, reputation, and class in Georgian England.

reviews.comment: The perfect romance novel. Austen's wit is unmatched.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
description: The story of Holden Caulfield, a teenager who has been expelled from prep school and is wandering around New York City. A controversial and influential coming-of-age story.

reviews.comment: Holden's voice is so authentic. Really captures teenage angst.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: Set in the distant future amidst a feudal interstellar society, Dune tells the story of young Paul Atreides. An epic science fiction novel that won both the Hugo and Nebula awards.

reviews.comment: The greatest science fiction novel ever written. Herbert created an entire universe.
